name: Adaptive Defenses
description: Innate: Periodically, Camille's next basic attack against enemy champions is enhanced to  shield her for  20% of her maximum health for 2 seconds from either exclusively  physical damage or  magic damage, based on which type the target has previously dealt most of against champions as well as on Camille's current  armor and  magic resistance.
descriptions: Innate: Periodically, Camille's next basic attack against enemy champions is enhanced to  shield her for  20% of her maximum health for 2 seconds from either exclusively  physical damage or  magic damage, based on which type the target has previously dealt most of against champions as well as on Camille's current  armor and  magic resistance.

name: Precision Protocol
description: Active: Camille's next basic attack becomes  unstoppable, gains  50 bonus range, deals bonus physical damage and grants her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.
leveling: Bonus Physical Damage:20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% ADBonus Movement Speed:20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40%
damageType: Physical damage / True damage
levelings: Bonus Physical Damage:20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% ADBonus Movement Speed:20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40%
descriptions: Active: Camille's next basic attack becomes  unstoppable, gains  50 bonus range, deals bonus physical damage and grants her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.
Precision Protocol can then be recast within the next 3.5 seconds at no extra cost.

Recast: Camille mimics the first cast's effects. If recast at least 1.5 seconds after the first attack, Precision Protocol's damage is doubled and 40% − 100% (based on level) of the total damage is dealt as  true damage.
Both casts of Precision Protocol  reset Camille's basic attack timer. The attacks' animations can be cancelled by casting other abilities, but the attacks will still land.

name: Tactical Sweep
description: Active: Camille sweeps her leg to deal physical damage to all enemies in a cone in the target direction after a 1.1-second delay, during which she's  ghosted and is unable to declare basic attacks.
leveling: Physical Damage:»70 / 100 / 130 / 160 / 190 (+ 60% bonus AD)«Non-Epic Monster Damage:35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 (+ 30% bonus AD)
levelings: Physical Damage:»70 / 100 / 130 / 160 / 190 (+ 60% bonus AD)«Non-Epic Monster Damage:35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 (+ 30% bonus AD)

Outer Cone Bonus Damage:»6 / 6.5 / 7 / 7.5 / 8% (+ 3.3% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health«Bonus Non-Epic Monster Damage:3 / 3.25 / 3.5 / 3.75 / 4% (+ 1.6% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health
descriptions: Active: Camille sweeps her leg to deal physical damage to all enemies in a cone in the target direction after a 1.1-second delay, during which she's  ghosted and is unable to declare basic attacks.

Enemies hit by the outer half of the cone take bonus physical damage and are  slowed by 80% that decays over 2 seconds, capped at 300 damage against  monsters. Camille is  healed for the bonus damage dealt against enemy  champions.
Non-epic monsters take 50% damage from Tactical Sweep.
Other abilities can be cast during the animation without cancelling it.

name: Hookshot
description: Active: Camille fires a grapple in the target direction. If the grapple collides with terrain, Camille will  dash toward and bind to the terrain for 0.75 seconds. While bound, she gains the ability to cast  Wall Dive.
descriptions: Active: Camille fires a grapple in the target direction. If the grapple collides with terrain, Camille will  dash toward and bind to the terrain for 0.75 seconds. While bound, she gains the ability to cast  Wall Dive.
Other abilities can be cast during the ability. Casting  The Hextech Ultimatum will cancel the grapple.

name: The Hextech Ultimatum
description: Active: Camille becomes  untargetable and  leaps with  displacement immunity towards the target enemy  champion over 0.6 seconds,  disrupting their ongoing  channels.
levelings: Bonus Magic Damage:5 / 10 / 15 (+ 4 / 6 / 8% of target's current health)
descriptions: Active: Camille becomes  untargetable and  leaps with  displacement immunity towards the target enemy  champion over 0.6 seconds,  disrupting their ongoing  channels.
When she lands, she becomes targetable again and creates a hexagonal zone around the target's current location for a duration,  knocking away all other nearby enemies on impact.
The target cannot escape the zone through any means. While within the zone, Camille's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage.
The Hextech Ultimatum ends automatically within 1 second if Camille leaves the area or dies.
